example: Air injection, flying debris, hose whip, eye injury.
Body/limbs trapped between moving and fixed objects.
Shock/burn risk during access to panels/cables; damaged insulation.
Burns from hot pipes, steam, heated product, hot water.
Lifting cartons, awkward postures, repetitive movements.
High noise zones causing hearing damage; poor communication.
Hands/clothing caught in moving parts (nip points, rollers, rejector arms).
Cuts from knives, blades, metal edges, damaged guards.
Wet floors, hoses, spilled product, uneven surfaces.
Blunt force injury to face or limbs
